definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
to place great importance on/to treasure
lit. as if enumerating one's family valuables (idiom)/fig. to be very familiar with a matter
precious/extremely valuable/(honorific) Please take good care of yourself!
He Zizhen (1910-1984), Mao Zedong's third wife

sentences.english: Although there was little food in the house, Jean concocted a splendid meal.
sentences.chinese: 雖然家裏只有少許食物，珍仍然烹調了一頓盛餐。

sentences.english: Precious, you know I love you.
See Jane and her aunt, shiva questioning what there doing.
sentences.chinese: 看到珍和她姨媽，希瓦質問他們在做什麼。

sentences.english: So dazzlingly radiant, it must be treasure rare.
sentences.chinese: 定是珍奇異寶，如此奪目璀璨。

sentences.english: Jane was born in London, England on April 3, 1934.
sentences.chinese: 珍於1934年4月3日出生在英國倫敦。

sentences.english: Classic mary jane with adjustable hook-and-loop strap never goes out of style.
sentences.chinese: 可調鉤環帶的瑪麗珍經典永不熄滅的風格。

sentences.english: Jane is charge of the office while Mr. Smith is away.
sentences.chinese: 當史密斯先生不在時，珍看管辦公室。

sentences.english: Leslie and Jan are meeting in the park.
sentences.chinese: 萊絲莉和珍在公園碰面。

sentences.english: We had a beautiful lunch and luxury lunch break of more than one hour.
sentences.chinese: 大家喫喝得珍珍有味，豪華地休整了一個多鐘頭。

sentences.english: We had a beautiful lunch and luxury lunch break of more than one hour.
sentences.chinese: 大家喫喝得珍珍有味，豪華地休整了一個多鐘頭。

sentences.english: Jane and Lucy have not talked to each other since they quarreled.
sentences.chinese: 珍跟露西從吵架後就再也沒有互相說話。

sentences.english: We found that many in China drink Tanghot, rather than cold.
sentences.chinese: 我們發現，在中國有許多人更喜歡喝熱的菓珍飲料。

sentences.english: There are, including tea flavor, the Jane.
Do you have a Chindogu of your own?
sentences.chinese: 你想擁有你一個你自己的珍道具麼？

definition: jasper/fine jade/beautiful/exquisite (e.g. wine, food)/abbr. for Hainan province
warm and virtuous/(used in given names)/Taiwan pr. [shu2]
